DOC.brief_summary: This study is to describe the safety and efficacy of Xyntha® during the usual care setting.
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance To Observe Safety And Efficacy Of Xyntha® In Subjects With Hemophilia A
DOC.criteria: Patients or legally authorized representatives of pediatric patients agree to provide written informed consent form (data privacy statement). Pediatric and adult patients who have been treated with Xyntha for Hemophilia A from first approved date by KFDA, or who are planned to be newly prescribed Xyntha. Patients with a known history of hypersensitivity to original or reformulated Xyntha or any component of the product. Patients with a known history of hypersensitivity to hamster protein. Patients participating in an interventional trial of any investigational drug or device.
